lightracer

Class PasswordHash

  • java.lang.Object
    • lightracer.PasswordHash

  • public class PasswordHash
extends java.lang.Object
    The PasswordHash class contains methods for correctly hashing a given string, which will be a password, and for displaying the hash as a hex-string
    Author:
    Syed Irtaza Raza

      Converts a hash stored in a byte array to a hex-string
      static byte[] computeHash(java.lang.String x)
      Hashes an input string and returns the hash as a byte array

      • computeHash

        public static byte[] computeHash(java.lang.String x)
        Hashes an input string and returns the hash as a byte array
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • byteArrayToHexString

        public static java.lang.String byteArrayToHexString(byte[] b)
        Converts a hash stored in a byte array to a hex-string

        Returns:
        the hex-string representation of the hash
